targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "DistanceCycling" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/1000 FROM "DistanceSwimming" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "DistanceWalkingRunning" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "FlightsClimbed" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "StepCount" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "AppleExerciseTime" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"
SELECT sum("value")/60 FROM "AppleStandTime" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$source$/) AND  time > now() - 365d GROUP BY "unit"

panels.title: Time spent standing up per day

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "autogen"."SleepAnalysis" WHERE ("state"::tag = 'HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysisInBed') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"::tag
SELECT sum("value") FROM "autogen"."SleepAnalysis" WHERE ("state"::tag = 'HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysisInBed') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device"::tag
